metadata.name: DIALOGUE WITH HIM
metadata.description:
The path of life, the road of destiny or a ladder with obstacles? 
 
Staircase leading to our end or to the beginning of a new existence?  
Staircase leading up to HIM!  

Who is he? What is he? What is this place? Where we try to find answers, where do we appeal every day, where do we always look with hope and faith!  

But will we find the answers there? Will we be heard there? Will our hope and our faith be justified? 

Each of us has his own road, his own ladder, but the number of steps does not always depend only on HIM!  

Main Questions - Can he exist without our prayers? And can we live without faith in HIM?

P.S  
The author is a believer and this work was created solely for artistic purposes as a reflection of all the versatility of art! The author does not try to touch the feelings of believers or offend any religion.
